reviewText: Was unable to watch it wrong region code won't play can I return it ? Still have the envelope it came in
I like this movie because it is the full and complete version of the original film. I used to watch the amended cut on the TV and that was not enough for a thriller lover.
I am a person who loves good old scary movies!! yes I would recommend this movie. I love Stephen kings movies

I couldn't even watch this movie.  When I tried to watch this, it said that it wasn't allowed in this region, (whatever that means).  Not happy at all!!!!
Good movie. I also had it on Video tape but my tape was getting bad and I needed a replacement.
Love this movie, this is the real vampire movie, I am in the usa and play very well in my Viore dvd player.
I was very disappointed that the DVDs won't play in a standard player. I will never order anything from you again.... awful
It is not viewable on any DVD player. It reads as foreign error. It is useless and was a complete waste of money!!! I seriously considered not using your service anymore.

It won't play on my samsung DVD player which has never had a problem This just keeps
saying it  will not play on this format?
So great! This movie is amazing, and non-USA format works in Mexico! (Mexico is region 4) I can see this movie!
A TV classic!!  Not the same as "The Night Stalker" as a classic of its type, but I can still remember the terror I felt watching it.

I really can't rate this one. I didn't see that it was unable to play in the us region when I bought it. So I paid 3.99 for shipping to you, and 10.00  shipping to the uk company to send it back. I got back 5.71 . I was left with -15.00 in the hole, and no movie. I'll make sure any movie I get next time it USA compatible .
